about_the_game:
Titanium Skin by Maven Tactical

Introducing the Titanium Skin by Maven Tactical, one of the largest manufacturers specializing in weapon customization for military and home defense. Experience a cleaner and premium aesthetic with cutting-edge finishing that elevates your firearms. The Titanium Skin exhibits a three-shade color palette of Titanium metal, complemented by a brushed finish, delivering a soothing and elegant feel. This skin pack mirrors the lightweight yet robust feel of the metal, offering a sophisticated and durable appearance for your weaponry.

This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

All skin brands are a fictional part of Zero Hour and does not represent any real or existing entities. Any resemblance to actual brands is purely coincidental. The purpose of using fictional brand names is solely for creative and illustrative purposes.
